abstract: Investors are worried about Apple’s sales during a recession. The bigger question is how Apple handles the slowdown.
snippet: Investors are worried about Apple’s sales during a recession. The bigger question is how Apple handles the slowdown.
lead_paragraph: Apple investors freaked out Monday, in part because two Wall Street analysts downgraded the stock. They are worried that margins will be compressed and sales of Macintosh computers and iPhones will be less than expected.
